title: Tumko Na Bhool Paayenge (2002)
description:
# Language: Hindi
# Movie: Tumko Na Bhool Paayenge
# Genre: Action, Romance, Drama, Musical, Mystery

# Actors: Salman Khan, Sushmitha Sen, Diya Mirza, Inder Kumar
# Director: Pankaj Parashar

# Release Date: 24 February 2002 (India)

#Synopsis:
Vir (Salman Khan) is the only son of Thakur Punya Pratap Singh (Sharat Saxena) and his Thakurani (Nishigandha Wad). Both the parents simply dote on Vir. Such is the father's love for his son, that during their morning run, if Vir says he's tired, the Thakur happily carries his grown up son home! Such is the mother's love for her son that she forces him to drink a large jug of egg and milk every morning! Gentle and sweet tempered Vir revels in their adoration.

But their idyllic world is suddenly shattered.

Armed commandoes hunt a running Vir? A huge dog attacks a terrified Vir? A sharp shooter trains his gun on a horrified Vir? Vir is frightened?.

His family and friends are perplexed? Because only Vir can see these incidents! Is this a question of rebirth? A case of reincarnation?

Is it hallucination? Or is Vir simply going mad?

Who is Ali? Does Vir have a twin brother?

And who are Masoom and Mehak? How is he connected to these two lovely girls?

For the answers? Expect the unexpected?In Tumko Na Bhool Payenge.
